name: ember
description:
Ember Communication Pattern Library The Ember suite provides
communication patterns in a simplified setting (simplified by the
removal of application calculations, control flow, etc.).

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
MVAPICH2-GDR is an optimized version of the MVAPICH2 MPI library for
GPU-enabled HPC and Deep Learning Applications. MVAPICH2-GDR is not
installable from source and is only available through a binary mirror.
If you do not find the binary you're looking for, send us an email at
mvapich@cse.ohio-state.edu. The binary mirror url is:
http://mvapich.cse.ohio-state.edu/download/mvapich/spack-
mirror/mvapich2-gdr/

dependent_to.name: ecp-proxy-apps
dependent_to.description:
This is a collection of packages that represents the official suite of
DOE/ECP proxy applications. This is a Spack bundle package that installs
the ECP proxy application suite.
